Articles.Content:
Give us your most unhelpful tips for daily life. Please limit it to one at a time, and nothing that is actually a good idea

  • Lose 1 kg of weight overnight by drinking a litre of water before going to bed
If you murder someone, bury them 6ft. under a dead dog. When the police try to dig up the body, they'll find the dog and think it's a false positive.

Lose weight easily by going to the toilet!

Getting rid of that biological waste will reduce your weight!

 

warning: effect might not be sustainable in the long term
• Don't have much time and your craft is decending into the atmosphere too slowly? Cut the parachute to get to the ground faster.
No clean cups for those healthy drinks of water? No problem! Drink from the tap 100% of the time and never dirty a cup again.
You can kill bacteria and viruses on your hands by burning them!

Wan't to get a car but don't have the money?

Steal one. You get the car you want and you don't loose any money!

It's fool proof.....

Got a minor cut? You can get rid of it instantly by cutting it off!

 

4 hours ago, Maximus97 said:

No clean cups for those healthy drinks of water? No problem! Drink from the tap 100% of the time and never dirty a cup again.

I actually do that IRL.

4 hours ago, Andem said:

If you murder someone, bury them 6ft. under a dead dog. When the police try to dig up the body, they'll find the dog and think it's a false positive.

You can do something similar in the game Yandere Simulator, (not sure if it's implemented yet, or if it's still being worked on).
Lost on Moon? Want to breathe? Do not worry, Moon does mostly consist of oxygen.
• Tired of getting bruises and injuries when skiing? Try going to one of those places with prepared routes instead of holding on behind cars on the motorway.
Running low on food? Cut off an arm and eat it! Not only will you gain calories, but your overall caloric needs will be reduced!
Do you have tons of annoying little flys in your kitchen? Don't worry, just catch some frogs and let magic happen!
• Kitchen overrun by frogs? It's easy to fix! Just release a few Grass Snakes and they will take care of the problem for you.
How do you get those pesky birds to stop chirping in the morning by your window? It's easy! Just get the shotgun, and...
Lose weight easily by removing excess limbs!
Protip: shoot yourself with smaller caliber bullets to build up an immunity to larger caliber bullets.

Are you sick, but cant afford those expensive perscription antibiotics?

Most over the counter hand sanitisers can kill up to 99.9% of bacteria at a fraction of the cost. In fact, many hospitals, clinics and pharmacists will have a dispenser available for free public use.

Just take a few swallows for free and save your cash!
Protip: You have two lungs, so sell one of them on the black market for an easy profit!

Spoiler

I'm gonna leave this here

Protip: If you have problems with constipation or need a quick cleanse, try Sugar Free Gummy Bears!

WARNING: Don't actually do this. The reviews provided in the link should provide reason enough to not attempt consumption of these monstrosities.

Edited October 2, 2016 by njmksr

Tried the previous protip? Swallowed 20 Sugar Free Gummy Bears? Got knots in your intestines?

Just eat a Sugar Free Duke Igthorn, and they will be full of each other.
Dump corn starch in your drains and rinse to clean them!
Do you have small, hard to get out stains on your carpets? These can be easily removed with a chainsaw.

Have a clog in your toilet? Fill the tank with mercury, and flush!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GvVaaZ21C44

10 hours ago, njmksr said:

Protip: You have two lungs, so sell one of them on the black market for an easy profit!

You also have 2 intestines! You can sell one of the intestines on the black market as well!

There's a male-specific thing that humans have 2 of, one of them can be sold on the black market as well, not saying what it is though.

Edited October 3, 2016 by CAKE99
